summary: E McK Hutton was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCA). The documents provided are payroll and certification reports that list Hutton's name, salary, and employment dates. Hutton was employed by the committee at least from April 1978 to December 1978. The documents do not specify Hutton's role within the committee, but they confirm their employment and compensation during the specified periods.
significance: E McK Hutton's significance lies in their employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating their involvement in the investigation of the JFK assassination, although the specific nature and extent of their role are not detailed in these documents.
